website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a landscape rake that suitable for basic use and fits a budget-conscious consumer, this is a good pick.
pros: This tough rake is built to grab and move landscape debris
Fiberglass construction makes the rake lightweight but strong
Seven-gauge steel tines are very durable
Price is at least half that of others on our list
cons: At 16 inches, the head is shorter than competitors on our list
Handle durability is questionable for extra heavy-duty use

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately upon use taking weeds
customer_reviews.text: Finally spring comes and I got a chance to use this thing and it broke within an hour taking up old weeds. If it can’t do this and the company doesn’t get back to me then that’s the point of the tool??
customer_reviews.author: Will Kern

customer_reviews.title: Not for commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: The rake is ok. For commercial use I will choose a different brand next time. The fiberglass handles are weak. And we also had a metal head break on another rake. Had issues with a shovel from them last year. Customer service does not really exist for them to stand behind their product. Calls and emails have been not returned. At my company we have had better success with Razorback products or other true professional grade products.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bougher

customer_reviews.title: Another quality tool from Bully
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a variety of bully tools to replace me worn garden tools. Every bully tool I own has exceeded my expectations with build quality and performance. The only downside to bully tools is that they tend to be heavy but depending on how you look at it that is one of the advantages as well. When I need a garden tool replacement I always look to see what bully has to offer. Don’t always buy the bully brand because sometimes bully does not make the type or style of tool I am looking for to accomplish a task. Can’t go wrong with bully tools and the USA made guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: A rake on steroids
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's a rake...but it's a rake on steroids. I really like the solid quality of this tool. I was unfamiliar with this brand, but now I love this beast. I also ordered (and have used) this the Bully Tools garden hoe (more on that in the hoe review. Anyway, I would for sure recommend this if someone is looking for a strong, quality yard tool.
customer_reviews.author: John Crispell

customer_reviews.title: Oh another Bully Tool to make work easier!
customer_reviews.text: I own several Bully tools and I really like them all. I really like the quality of the two 16" Level Head rakes I received, they are so strong, built to last, and really comfortable in my hands. I liked how light it feels. I need tough & durable tools in my Landscaping work, and Bully Tools fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: markld

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, dependable rake
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 truckloads of mulch delivered and instead of joining a gym I have been loading and distributing mulch with my beloved rake. Nothing like a great tool to really make me want to get the job done! Love my rake!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have started purchasing only bully tools for the crew of gorillas that work for me. As with the shovels I've bought in the past, this Bully rake is very tough. Never say indestructible, but if used for anything like it's intended purpose it should last a lifetime. This makes the rather steep price with free shipping reasonable. That, and it is made here in the USA. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hi Desert

customer_reviews.title: Toughest rake ever....so far....
customer_reviews.text: Amazing rake, this is the toughest rock rake I have ever used. I'm a bit concerned by the single rivet attachment of the head to the handle, however I have had no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Super Nova

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Tool
customer_reviews.text: THis is a nice sturdy tool. It's lasted longer than any other rock rake I've had. A little heavier but thats the price of using more metal and a sturdier design.
customer_reviews.author: blah

customer_reviews.title: just want a cap sent to me Nice heavy duty rake
customer_reviews.text: End cap on rake is missing , just want a cap sent to me Nice heavy duty rake.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rake
customer_reviews.text: Bully tools actually improve designs and they do this very well. This made in the USA rake is strong, light and works very well. It's a lifetime rake for a home owner. I like to buy commercial grade tools that last and last and prefer made in the USA. Bully meets my criteria and their stuff takes a lot of punishment that legacy brands cannot handle.
customer_reviews.author: BossHogg

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rake
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid rake. It easy and strong for raking the gravel we have. Will definitely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Good rake
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems like a good sturdy rake. Wanted it for gravel and it seems like it’ll do the job.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: should last forever
customer_reviews.text: this sucker is tough. we muck our goat stalls with it daily. feels like one of those tools that will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Black

customer_reviews.title: Nice rake for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice rake for the money. It's not heavy duty but seem strong. Did what I needed it for, which is to pull up dead grass and weeds in preparation for sodding.
customer_reviews.author: DcFL

customer_reviews.title: This rake is worth the extra cost. I used ...
customer_reviews.text: This rake is worth the extra cost. I used it to remove old grass, many inches of dirt, and to push gravel around. The ones I got from the local stores all broke off .
customer_reviews.author: Kimk166

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was initially surprised and happy as the rake appeared to be heavy duty, however the rake head snapped while raking through soil with roots. I am going to contact the company to see if they will issue a replacement. Hoping they will and that I’ll have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: A most excellent rake. Heavy head and lightweight indestructible handle. Should last a lifetime. (At least for MY lifetime) =)
customer_reviews.author: Spiceguy

customer_reviews.title: Forged steel head
customer_reviews.text: This is one strong rake. I like the flat back as it makes leveling the soil so much easier. This is made to last a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Little heavy but sure is solid!
customer_reviews.text: Little heavy but sure is solid ! tired of box store ones bending and coming off the handle SO far this doesnt do that Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sako

customer_reviews.title: handle too short for tall folks.
customer_reviews.text: Handle is too short, and had a crack in it already when I bought it. If you are 6 foot or over , I would get one with a longer handle...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Fun Message.
customer_reviews.text: Funny, funny. Message told me it was left in the mailbox. Too big for that. Left on porch. Thank you. l
customer_reviews.author: Della M. Meisinger

customer_reviews.title: Can't find a more stand up Company
customer_reviews.text: Rake works like it should but most of all this is the type of company one wants to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy metal rake. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy rake... use it to move around compost and pull down extra vines... good buy no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Weenie

customer_reviews.title: The price on this item is very variable,
customer_reviews.text: The price on this item is very variable, I picked it up when it was cheap and it beats any of the HDX branded stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Buck

customer_reviews.title: stronger than most
customer_reviews.text: Beefy rake not like the ones I'm used to pick it up from Home Depot best breakup ever bought I put it through hell I'm still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Good rake for heavy work
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Why is it so hard to find this kind of rake? Only problem with this particular one is that the rubber handle tip has not lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu the Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Nice rake only last about a year
customer_reviews.text: It was a good rake until today and it broke 😭
customer_reviews.author: Rashell Dolin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a good buy plus made in the good old u.s.a.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used the product to rake parts of the lawn prior to overseeding. Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my new favorite rack great rack i will never buy another brand love my Bully!
customer_reviews.author: naughtyfairy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rake! I tried it out as soon as it arrived and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: london

customer_reviews.title: Made in America.
customer_reviews.text: Well made rake, also have the bow rake for landscaping. Like that they are made just about an hour and a half from my home.
customer_reviews.author: David Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Bully rake
customer_reviews.text: very well built rake...nice to find people still believe in quality
customer_reviews.author: Exnavy79

customer_reviews.title: What a Box!
customer_reviews.text: This ended up a bit too heavy for me but good quality. I probably didn’t need a rake this wide. It’s kind of clumsy for me. Only gave 4 stars because of the packaging! It arrived in a huuuuge box about 6’ tall and a good 18” square. It was padded with an endless amount of brown packing paper. It literally looked like a coffin in my living room. I know it’s an awkward item to ship but....really?
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good durable rake would give it five stars but the head warped some but still works fine
customer_reviews.author: Clancy

customer_reviews.title: weak handle
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for business use. the rake head is great, but the handle is not. they just don't hold up to every day use. i think we have already broken half of the ones we ordered. certainly will not buy again. the handle is just not strong enough
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Walker

customer_reviews.title: If you need to spread some dirt, this is the best tool.
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. The best tool know for spreading dirt. The quality of this particular rake seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: D1C1C3D2

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used much yet, do can't speak to durability ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used much yet, do can't speak to durability but I will say that it is quite heavy, even for a fit gardener!
customer_reviews.author: City Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not what Bully claims
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rake for my husband for his business. He used it to rake stone for septic install and the rake head was actually bending. This is not as heavy duty as they claim. Bought the Truper rake at the same time... better rake for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Cumings

product_meta.title: Bully Tools 92311 16-Inch Level Head Rake with Fiber Glass Handle and 14 Steel Head Tines, 60-Inch
product_meta.description:
The Bully Tools Level Head Rake can handle heavy duty jobs. It features a 16 tine steel head and triple wall fiberglass which resists breakage while still being lightweight.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tools made to last a lifetime, and be passed on from generation to generation.Bully Tools is bringing back that tradition with tools built to endure years of hard labor. We have re-engineered the classic designs of shovels, rakes and other popular tools to create more efficient, durable products. Special features on specific products include true 14 gauge steel, triple wall reinforced fiberglass handles, extended length ferrules, and welded I-beam supports. In a time when cheap foreign products are the norm, Bully Tools offers affordable, high quality goods.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
